Additional notes
Blackmayne were together for a couple of years then split just after their album was released. Original sleeve design of the album was destroyed in a fire on the way to the printers, so a new album design had to be done. This put the release of the album back several months. This delay to the release pissed the band members off and resulted in splitting up.
